text: Adubu machanupa amabu khandokpiba asi mapung phana Tengban Mapu masagi maramnani haiba asi oinanaba Tengban Mapuna Rebecca-da haikhi, “Ahan aduna atomba adubu thougal tougani.” Masi makhoina poktringei nattraga aphaba nattraga phattaba kari amata toudringeida Ibungona masi haibani; maramdi Tengban Mapugi khandokpiba adu Ibungo mahakki koubibada yumpham oi amadi madu makhoina touba thabak amatada yumpham oide.
